GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
misc: ocxl: fix possible name leak in ocxl_file_register_afu()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 7525741cb302a1672b8c3a5edb2a08e4229b5c7c, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit 75ca758adbafc81804c39b2c200ecdc819a6c042. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: misc: ocxl: fix possible name leak in ocxl_file_register_afu()
